name: Bet the Schloog!: The Video Game
name_original: Bet the Schloog!: The Video Game
description: Bet The Schloog! is a card game I invented where the rules are purposely not clear. It is misleading, and is more of a puzzle game than a card game. I have been working on this, and although there are some minor bugs and some rules had to be altered, it is mostly the same game. Please enjoy!
